info.title: VetCore Web API
info.description: VetCore Web API for managing VetCore applications and websites

post.description: Used to authenticate users and retrieve a JWT token. Can optionally set an HttpOnly cookie.
Clears JWT-related cookies. Mainly useful when authentication relies on HttpOnly cookies.
Issues a new JWT using a refresh token from the body or cookie.
Creates a new user account and returns an authentication token. CAPTCHA verification required.

get.description: Restricted to super admins. Returns the full list of users in the system.

post.description: Does not reload the cache. Can be called multiple times before commit.
Does not reload the cache. Can be called multiple times before commit.
Starts or restarts an upload transaction lasting 30 minutes. Returns expiration date.
Marks the transaction as final. Missing data will be considered obsolete and removed.

get.summary: Get all animals for a customer

get.description: Returns all animals for an establishment, optionally paginated.
the provided day should be the starting day of the week. The 7 next days will be retrieved
the provided day should be the starting day of the month wanted. We will add one month from the required day
Returns all customers for an establishment. Supports optional pagination.
Returns a paginated list of all customers. Restricted to super admins.
Returns all invoices for the latest subscription of the specified establishment UID. Access restricted to SuperAdmin.
Each establishment could have its own set of appointment's reasons
Returns all establishments in the system. Only accessible by super admins.

post.summary: Validate subscription and create new establishment
post.description: Verifies amount, finalizes the setup intent, and creates a new establishment for the user.

get.description: Returns establishments linked to the current authenticated user, including preferred ones.

post.description: Assigns current user to an establishment using a valid assignment code.

patch.description: Allows changing the name or location(s) of the establishment.

post.description: Creates a one-time code to invite a user to the establishment with a given role.
Sends a deletion request for an establishment. Action is deferred and reviewed.

patch.description: Updates subscription plan and options. Accessible to managers only.

get.description: Returns a single invoice using its unique identifier. Access restricted to SuperAdmin.

post.description: Initializes a SetupIntent on Stripe to collect and attach a payment method.
Handles Stripe event notifications. Must be configured in the Stripe dashboard.

get.description: Returns the current pricing configuration for all subscription plans and options.
Returns the API proxy base URL. Used for local/offline support.

get.summary: Ping for a specific establishment as authenticated user

get.description: Returns a JWT token identifying the backend to Keycloak. Super admin only.

post.description: Checks validity of a JWT token and returns diagnostic details.
Advances the simulated time by a given number of days. Requires FakeTimeProvider and SuperAdmin.
Sets the simulated time to an explicit UTC value. Requires FakeTimeProvider and SuperAdmin.
Sends a SignalR message to all users of the specified establishment. Caller must belong to it.
Allows super admin to send a SignalR message to any establishment.
Sends a SignalR message to a specific user. Super admin only.
Broadcasts a server ping message to all connected users.
Broadcasts a ping message to all establishments users. Super admin only.

get.description: Returns all invoices related to the given subscription UID. Access restricted to SuperAdmin.
